section.title: Translate metadata objects
section.para: DHIS2 provides functionality for translations of database content, for example data elements, data element groups, indicators, indicator groups or organisation units. You can translate these elements to any number of locales. A locale represents a specific geographical, political, or cultural region.

tip.para: To activate a translation, open the System Settings app, click > Appearance and select a language.

listitem.para: Open the Maintenance app and find the type of metadata object you want to translate.
In the object list, click the options menu and select Translate.

tip.para: If you want to translate an organisation unit level, click directly on the Translate icon next to each list item.

listitem.para: Type a Name, Short name and Description.
